comments:
php elements from include path variable does not display in the php explorer.

The php elements in the file that added by the zip file to the include path, 
should be shown in the php explorer view.

Add new zip as a include path variable.
In the php explorer view, expand the node of the include path.
inspect, every file with element should be expandable, and to view the php 
elements.
